channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek On Air – Episode 10 – Mobile App Marketing with David Rangel, COO Corona Labs

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Wow, David really gave out some great tips during this interview. I've actually seen some apps that have asked me for my email address when I first start them. I haven't really thought to do this before but it makes sense. I'd love to know how many Corona Developer are using this strategy.
item.content:encoded: Wow, David really gave out some great tips during this interview. I’ve actually seen some apps that have asked me for my email address when I first start them. I haven’t really thought to do this before but it makes sense. I’d love to know how many Corona Developer are using this strategy.
